product.title: Forum Runner
product.description: Adds push notification for your users using Forum Runner on the iPhone/iPod/iPad. Also takes care of notifying users that your forum supports Forum Runner if they are viewing from a supported device.

code.uninstallcode: $db->query("DROP TABLE IF EXISTS " . TABLE_PREFIX . "forumrunner_push_data"); $db->query("DROP TABLE IF EXISTS " . TABLE_PREFIX . "forumrunner_push_users");

templates.template: <!-- Forum Runner Begin --> <script type="text/javascript" src="$vboptions[bburl]/forumrunner/detect.js"></script> <!-- Forum Runner End -->

plugin.title: Forum Runner: Admin Options: Print CMS Categories
Forum Runner: Admin Options Override
Forum Runner: Admin Options Processing
Forum Runner: Disable Incompatible Addons
Forum Runner: Location Display

phrasetype.name: Scheduled Tasks
phrasetype.phrase: This runs every 10 minutes and queues up private message and thread subscription notifications to send to the Forum Runner server to be distributed to your users running Forum Runner. It sends no personal or identifying information.
Forum Runner Push Notification
This task runs once a day to make sure your forum is published in the main directory. If it is unpublished, it will disable the prompt for your users to download the Forum Runner app.
Forum Runner Check Status

phrasetype.name: Error Messages
phrasetype.phrase: You do not have permission to view current threads in any forums.

phrasetype.name: GLOBAL
phrasetype.phrase: Thanked by

phrasetype.name: Register
phrasetype.phrase:
Forum Rules

Registration to this forum is free! We do insist that you abide by the rules and policies detailed below. If you have read over and agree to the terms, please check the appropriate box in the app.

Although the administrators and moderators of this forum will attempt to keep all objectionable messages off this forum, it is impossible for us to review all messages. All messages express the views of the author, and the owners of the forum will not be held responsible for the content of any message.

By agreeing to these rules, you warrant that you will not post any messages that are obscene, vulgar, sexually-oriented, hateful, threatening, or otherwise violative of any laws.

The owners of the forum reserve the right to remove, edit, move or close any thread for any reason.

By creating an account on this forum, you are also stating that you are at least 13 years of age.

phrasetype.name: Control Panel Options
phrasetype.phrase: Exclude No Forums

phrasetype.name: vBulletin Settings
phrasetype.phrase: Enter the AdMob Publisher ID for Android that you have set up. See this post for full instructions on setting up AdMob.
AdMob Publisher ID for Android
Enter the AdMob Publisher ID for iPhone that you have set up. See this post for full instructions on setting up AdMob.
AdMob Publisher ID for iPhone
Choose a color for the background of the headers when your users browse into your app. Leave empty (or transparent) for the default color. This *MUST* be in the format "#rrggbb" OR "rgb(r, g, b)".
Background Color of Mobile App's Header

Select Yes if you would like users browsing your forum via Forum Runner to have a "News" menu which will list items from vBulletin's built in CMS system and allow your users to read your CMS postings as well as respond to them.
Enable In-App CMS Support?
Select which CMS section you would like to be shown to your users when they tap on the "News" menu by default. They will be able to change sections by tapping "Sections".
Default CMS Section to display

Enable this setting if you wish to allow in-app registration from your mobile devices. If disabled, when a user taps the "Register" button, they will simply be forwarded to your existing registration page.
Allow In-App Registration?

Choose which forums you would like to exclude from being listed through Forum Runner to your mobile users. You can use Control-Click to select multiple forums. If you want to list all forums, choose "Exclude No Forums".
Exclude Forums From Forum Runner
Enter the Google Analytics Account ID you wish to use for tracking analytic data. See this post on how to set up Google Analytics for Forum Runner. Leave blank if you do not wish to use this feature.
Google Analytics Account ID
Select Yes if you would like Forum Runner to embed a Google AdSense or AdMob ad at the bottom of the thread page (above the thread summary).
Place Google or AdMob Ad At Bottom Of Thread?

Comma separated list of Usergroup ID numbers to EXCLUDE from sending Google AdSense or AdMob ads to. You can get the ID #s from the "Usergroup Manager". This will override the include setting above (for example, if you want to exclude a secondary usergroup from AdSense/AdMob ads.
Usergroups to EXCLUDE sending Google or AdMob Ads To

Please note that if you are using AdMob, fill in the field above. This field is only for Google AdSense. Enter Google AdSense Mobile Javascript Code here. See this post for full instructions on setting up Google AdSense.
Google AdSense Mobile Javascript

Select Yes if you would like Forum Runner to embed Google AdSense or AdMob ads into threads on your user's mobile devices running the app. You will need to follow these instructions and fill in the following options to get this running.
Enable Google AdSense or AdMob Integration?
Select Yes if you would like Forum Runner to embed a Google AdSense or AdMob ad in the thread list (above the "Load More Threads" button).
Place Google or AdMob Ad In Thread List?
Select Yes if you would like Forum Runner to embed a Google AdSense or AdMob ad at the top of the thread page (below the first post).
Place Google or AdMob Ad At Top Of Thread?
Comma separated list of Usergroup ID numbers to send Google AdSense or AdMob ads to. You can get the ID #s from the "Usergroup Manager".
Usergroups to send Google or AdMob Ads To

Select Yes if you would like Forum Runner to send your users browsing through their mobile browsers on supported devices a one-time message notifying them about Forum Runner support, or No to disable this. If enabled and the user cancels the prompt, they will not be prompted again.
Enable Forum Runner Prompt?
Allow "Posted from my <device> using Forum Runner" to be appended to posts from your users who post from Forum Runner?
Allow Forum Runner Signatures?
Forum Runner Settings
